product.longDescription: Unique coloration and a warty appearance will make this variety stand out in an autumn display or at a farmers' market. A prolific, early yielder of uniform, durable fruits. Long, vigorous vines. Avg. weight: 6–10 lb. Intermediate resistance to powdery mildew. Avg. 3,500 seeds/lb. Packet: 30 seeds.

Grizzly Bear (F1) Pumpkin Seed

Product ID:4549.514549

Unique coloration and a warty appearance will make this variety stand out in an autumn display or at a farmers' market. A prolific, early yielder of uniform, durable fruits. Long, vigorous vines. Avg. weight: 6–10 lb. Intermediate resistance to powdery mildew. Avg. 3,500 seeds/lb. Packet: 30 seeds.
